page.title: 09HEALTH
page.content: Nowadays people are quite healthy.There are vaccinations against Measles,Whoop- ing Cough,Polio,Tetanus and all these sorts of germs.Most families are fairly hygienic. (Physicians) There are 2 dentists in Collingtree. They are both Mr.Wright! Mr.J.A Wright's surgery is at 21 Billing Road,Northampton. There are 5 doctors in our area;4 in our village,1 in Milton.We have a retired optitian in Collingtree.He is Mr.Monty Knight,husband of Dame Jill Knight D.B.E.,MP.The school dentist comes every 12 months.The school doctor sees people when they are 5,then again when they are 10.He sometimes sees certain people in between these ages.
